content: I noticed that the tracking issue template sometimes causes some confusion when used for library features, as it mostly assumes there's an RFC and it's a compiler/language change. I think we should just add a separate tracking issue template for library issues.

Looks like it's working perfectly. People are filing much more complete tracking issues, like this one just now: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/80094
:tada:

That's so much easier to get context from! I've also gone and updated our unstable API tool to nest things under module paths so maybe as we visit older tracking issues in the future we can update them to use the new template too.
